<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="catalog_script_client"><catalog_script_client action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>false</active><applies_catalog>true</applies_catalog><applies_extended>false</applies_extended><applies_req_item>false</applies_req_item><applies_sc_task>false</applies_sc_task><applies_target_record>false</applies_target_record><applies_to>item</applies_to><cat_item display_value="Configuraci칩n de Virtual Servers Citrix ">3105d62cdb7573002ca60d53ca961963</cat_item><cat_variable>IO:2e8027044f173300c09fb8de9310c75f</cat_variable><condition/><description/><field/><global>true</global><isolate_script>true</isolate_script><messages/><name>pruebaGET</name><order/><script><![CDATA[function onChange(control, oldValue, newValue, isLoading) {
	if (isLoading || newValue == '') {
		return;
	}
	
	var tipoSolicitud = g_form.getValue('que_deseas_hacer');
	
	if(tipoSolicitud != 'Ninguna' && tipoSolicitud != 'Agregar m치s servidores'){
		
		
		
	}
	//Type appropriate comment here, and begin script below
	var serv1 = g_form.getValue('servidor_a_eliminar_1');
	
	var choiceValue = g_form.getValue('servidor_a_eliminar_1');
	var choiceLabel = g_form.getOption('servidor_a_eliminar_1', choiceValue).text;
	var x = choiceLabel.replace(/ *\([^)]*\) */g, "");
	g_form.setValue('servidor_a_eliminar_1',x);
	
	//alert(x);
}]]></script><sys_class_name>catalog_script_client</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>114190586</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2019-10-09 21:42:30</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>d8e5a3071b5404102ad798aebd4bcb6e</sys_id><sys_mod_count>12</sys_mod_count><sys_name>pruebaGET</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="BCR_APP" source="x_287988_bcr_app">28f3b438db33230087d9d6aa48961993</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="BCR_APP">28f3b438db33230087d9d6aa48961993</sys_scope><sys_update_name>catalog_script_client_d8e5a3071b5404102ad798aebd4bcb6e</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2020-02-19 22:36:22</sys_updated_on><table/><type>onChange</type><ui_type>10</ui_type><variable_set/><view/></catalog_script_client></record_update>
